entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NavigationPage TitleBar Persists if child pages have a title #13807
  • Font Alias is not working #13805
  • Update .NET MAUI Blazor project template name to include "Blazor Hybrid" #13804
  • Path does not update its layout when Data is modified #13802
    Backlog
  • Path does not render if it has Margin #13801
    Backlog
  • Preventing NullReferenceException on WebAuthenticatorIntermediateActivity #13798
    .NET 8 Planning
  • XAML parser errors are formatted incorrectly, so navigating to XAML doesn't work #13797
    Backlog
  • Maui Blazor - using zxing js import first time working but not working second time when openning maui camera capture #13796
  • [Android] Color changes are not reflected in the Rectangle shapes in Release configuration. #13790
    Backlog
  • MAUI for CPU ARM 64 #13789
  • Unable to put content under statusbar with Shell Navigation in Android #13788
    Backlog
  • When building on Android and creating an .apk file, the file size is too large. #13785
  • FileNotFoundException when loading resx file #13784
  • MAUI item templates use wrong icons #13783
    Backlog
  • MAUI templates should respect tabs/spaces preferences like other templates #13782
    Backlog
  • Image clip throwing unhandled exception #13781
  • Property in SearchBar control to Hide "Cancel" button on iOS while edit/text enter operation using MAUI handlers and Mappers #13780
    Backlog
  • DisplayAlert is documented as a Modal dialog but cannot be closed or dismissed and isnt included in the Navigation ModalStack #13778
    Backlog
  • [Window] Choose the screen that the window will open #13777
    Backlog

Closed

  • Problema na Recarga Dinâmica #13803
  • Radiobutton Content is not Displayed in Right To Left Flow Direction when ControlTemplate is applied #6939
    Backlog
  • Laggy Scroll when Binding Image to url or stream. (FLEX LAYOUT) #11917
  • ScrollView Content cannot scroll inside Grid #12236
  • TodoREST Sample Project “HttpRequestException: The Internet connection appears to be offline.” “Local network prohibited” on iOS 16 #12731
  • Cookies read/write not working in WebView on WinUI #3901
    Backlog
  • ScrollView.ScrollToAsync(0, 0, true) not respect FlowDirection="RightToLeft" of scroll view #13635
  • RuntimeIdentifier platform problem #13791
  • Soft Keyboard does not Pop Up when Entry View's Focus is set to True Programmatically #5983
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Hide Cancel button for SearchBar on iOS while edit/text enter operation using MAUI handlers and Mappers not working #13720
  • Using Clipboard solves the error CO_E_NOTINITIALIZED ! #13719
  • Center VerticalTextAlignment on Entry doesn't work if it is initially invisble #13743
    Backlog
  • [Windows] "ClearButtonVisibility" property is not working properly when opening the Entry at run time #13714
    Backlog
  • MAUI application error due to entry element in background operation #13762
    Backlog
  • Radiobutton doesn't appear correctly when FlowDirection is RightToLeft #6708
    Backlog
  • Single project iOS Service Extensions #8299
  • Get the MAUI window object from the platform window object #13758
  • Tabbed pages with mapsui map do not work on Android but do on windows #13575
  • Apk file size degradation transition field to 7.0.52 #12263
    Backlog
  • [Android 12+]Splash screen doesn't appear on maui app #12636
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [controls] fix memory leak in `VisualElement.Clip` #13806
  • [net7.0] Show keyboard on Android entry/editor/searchbar focus #13799
  • Correctly propagate BindingContext to Border StrokeShape #13793
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0 to 7.0.1 #13792
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • [net7.0] Organize partial classes inside Controls (#13113) #13800
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Change Windows WebView Cookies to CoreWebView2 #13518
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Bugfix for text not properly aligned with radioButton when in RTL for Android #13610
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • Show keyboard on Android entry/editor/searchbar focus #12890
    area/controls 🎮, backport/suggested, backport/approved
  • [Housekeeping] Port latest fixes from Xamarin.Forms to .NET MAUI #11420
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Windows] Fix ClearButtonVisibility and VerticalTextAlignment issues with invisible Entry #13769
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-entry

Updated

  • Fix gestures in Label Spans #12027
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, area/gestures
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [MacOS/iOS] Fixed incorrect color of RadioButton in Dark Mode using Default Control Template. #13215
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • Create development path without compatibility projects #13660
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix iOS ListView cell gone hidden (#11287) #13669
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area/ListView
  • Cache the dynamic AppTheme value in Controls (and not Essentials) #11200
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>, platform/android 🤖, area/theme
  • [Android] Allow to update Entry Background (once established) #12227
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮
  • Fix iOS ListView Footer Missing (#13560) #13744
    community ✨, area/ListView
  • Run templates on Android and iOS #13662
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, area/testing
  • Avoid crash using BoxView visibility (avoid unnecessary parent) #11439
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
  • [Android] Fix issue correctly updating WrapperView content visibility #11531
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Android & iOS] Use the correct colors by themes with Alerts on Android and iOS #13318
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/theme
  • [macOS/iOS] Fix RequestedThemeChanged event #11199
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>, area/theme
  • Make Android sizing of ShapeViews consistent with iOS and Windows #6206
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, area/drawing ✏️
  • Implement Keyboard on SearchBarHandler #9851
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Windows] Implement IsTextPredictionEnabled on Windows SearchBar #13636
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Force menu rebuild when window is closed (#10702) #13709
    community ✨
  • Reinstate WebView cookie functionality for Android & iOS #13736
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Catch InvalidProtocolBufferException creating EncryptedSharedPreferences #13599
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Reenable ViewTransform unit tests for iOS #13642
    platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [iOS] Scroll with the keyboard to not block entries and editors #13499
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, layout-scrollview, keyboard
  • Fix syncing modal stack when the window is created/recreated #13025
    t/breaking 💥, area/modal, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
